description.value: You have an incredibly nimble tail that helps you balance in zero gravity; this could be a hereditary gift from your ancestors as they adapted to spaceflight or the result of personal augmentation. You can use your tail to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Push Off] while in zero-g without needing a free hand. In addition, you ignore the clumsy and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Off-Guard] penalties while @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Untethered] in zero gravity.
